entry.value:
{"id":"5f486b1b-6173-4a6b-8d53-dca3dbda7456","name":"Material3 Design: TextView TextAppearance Guidelines","timestamp":1748623242586,"messages":[{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"<additional_data>
Below are some potentially helpful/relevant pieces of information for figuring out to respond

<current_file>
```xml:app/src/main/res/layout/profile_admin_section.xml
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
 xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
 xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="match_parent">

 <de.hdodenhof.circleimageview.CircleImageView
 android:id="@+id/img_profile"
 android:layout_width="@dimen/_48sdp"
 android:layout_height="@dimen/_48sdp"
 android:layout_marginStart="@dimen/_15sdp"
 android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/_15sdp"
 android:background="?attr/selectableItemBackgroundBorderless"
 android:clickable="true"
 android:contentDescription="Profile Image"
 android:focusable="true"
 android:src="@drawable/ic_profile_avatar"
 app:civ_border_color="@color/md_theme_primary_mediumContrast"
 app:civ_border_width="@dimen/_1sdp"
 app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent"
 app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent"
 tools:ignore="VectorDrawableCompat" />

 <TextView
 android:id="@+id/tv_adminName"
 android:layout_width="0dp"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/_5sdp"
 android:paddingStart="@dimen/_10sdp"
 android:textAppearance="@style/TextAppearance.Material3.TitleMedium"
 app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@+id/img_profile"
 app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@+id/img_profile"
 tools:text="Azharul Islam" />

 <ImageView
 android:layout_width="16dp"
 android:layout_height="16dp"
 android:layout_marginStart="4dp"
 android:contentDescription="Verified email"
 android:src="@drawable/ic_admin"
 android:visibility="visible"
 app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@id/tv_adminName"
 app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/tv_adminName"
 app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@id/tv_adminName"
 app:tint="@color/md_theme_primary" />

 <TextView
 android:id="@+id/tv_profileTypeName"
 android:layout_width="0dp"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:layout_marginEnd="@dimen/_10sdp"
 android:paddingStart="@dimen/_10sdp"
 android:textAppearance="@style/TextAppearance.Material3.BodyMedium"
 android:textColor="@android:color/darker_gray"
 app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@+id/img_profile"
 app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@+id/tv_adminName"
 tools:text="azad...@gmail.com" />

 <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.Barrier
 android:id="@+id/barrier_profile"
 android:layout_width="wrap_content"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 app:barrierDirection="bottom"
 app:constraint_referenced_ids="img_profile" />

 <LinearLayout
 android:id="@+id/layout_adminProfile"
 android:layout_width="match_parent"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:layout_margin="@dimen/_10sdp"
 android:background="@drawable/custom_card_view_drawable"
 android:clickable="true"
 android:foreground="?attr/selectableItemBackground"
 android:orientation="horizontal"
 android:paddingStart="@dimen/_10sdp"
 android:paddingTop="@dimen/_5sdp"
 android:paddingEnd="@dimen/_15sdp"
 android:paddingBottom="@dimen/_5sdp"
 app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/barrier_profile">

 <Button
 style="@style/Widget.Material3.Button.IconButton.Filled.Tonal"
 android:layout_width="wrap_content"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:backgroundTint="#1ACFCFCF"
 android:clickable="false"
 app:icon="@drawable/ic_profile_avatar"
 app:iconTint="@android:color/black" />

 <TextView
 android:layout_width="wrap_content"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:layout_weight="1"
 android:paddingStart="@dimen/_10sdp"
 android:text="Your profile"
 android:textAppearance="@style/TextAppearance.Material3.BodyLarge" />


 <ImageView
 android:layout_width="wrap_content"
 android:layout_height="wrap_content"
 android:layout_gravity="center"
 android:src="@drawable/ic_forward_settings"
 app:tint="@color/md_theme_primary" />
 </LinearLayout>

 <!--Medical Record setup section-->
 <include
 android:id="@+id/include_medicalRecordSetup"
 layout="@layout/admin_medical_record_section" />

 <!--Admin activities setup-->
 <include
 android:id="@+id/include_adminSetup"
 layout="@layout/admin_activities_setup" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
```
</current_file>
</additional_data>


<user_query>
what should be textappearance according to design principle of this layout textviews
</user_query>"}]},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"text","text":"The `TextAppearance` should align with the Material Design guidelines that emphasize legibility and consistency. For the TextViews in this layout, you might consider:

1. **`tv_adminName`**: 
 - Use `@style/TextAppearance.Material3.TitleMedium` or similar, which you've already applied, ensuring it provides the right hierarchy and emphasis.

2. **`tv_profileTypeName`**: 
 - Consider `@style/TextAppearance.Material3.BodyMedium`, also present, to maintain consistency and readability for secondary information.

If deviating from these, make sure the text appearance styles are consistent with your overall app theme and Material Design principles."}]}]}
